Description: The Regulations, Codes & Standards Energy & Water Efficiency Senior Specialist is responsible for providing insight, technical and methodological expertise in shaping and developing energy and water related codes and standards (including district cooling, electricity, energy efficiency, wastewater, groundwater, desalinated water, and recycled water) in all sectors, including residential, commercial, government, industrial, agriculture, and others, in accordance with the vision and mission. ●     In collaboration with the government, key partners, and private sector stakeholders, assist in the development of a rigorous, evidence-based codes, and standards of energy and water efficiency.●     Provides reliable and unbiased information and insight on energy and water efficiency codes and standards related matters.●     Supports implementation of energy and water efficiency codes and standards and initiatives by providing expert support●     Provide advice raise awareness on water and energy efficiency codes and standards.Skills
Skills: 3 to 5 years of experience in relevant field.
